summary: This is the complete HQ 4 Glass blades retexture. each with there own unique texture. Flame dagger. Sapphire Greatsword. Crimson Glass Sword.ice Chilled cyan Chilledrend.which i think look pretty sweet. toke me 3 hrs to do them all in total so time and effot went in to this mod. i am also open to requests that u guys might have . so leave a comment
descriptionHtml:
This is the complete HQ 4 Glass blades retexture. each with there own unique texture. Flame dagger. Sapphire Greatsword. Crimson Glass Sword.ice Chilled cyan Chilledrend.all with glow effects which i think look pretty sweet. took me 3 hrs to do them all in total so time and effot went in to this mod. i am also open to requests that u guys might have . so leave a comment or pm me with ur ideas :).

if u like this mod please endorse and enjoy its benifits 

cheers GameNinjaPro 

updates to come when CK is released

COMMING SOON BLUNT WEAPONS AND AXES :D


i plane on doing a hole load of changes to the glass textures in the game and am also going to work on uniques with own textures and effects. but due to limitations i will wait till the CK is released.

to install follow the read me include in the file
author: GameNinjaPro
